short_summary: Parks Canada is seeking contractors to manufacture, deliver and install aluminum flagpoles at various parks and historic sites in Canada
description: Parks Canada is seeking contractors to manufacture 20-, 25-, 30- and 35-foot aluminium ground flagpoles. Deliveries must be made to parks and historic sites across Canada. The contractor will also provide installation instructions and technical support. Contracts are separated by region. Delivery deadline is May 31st, 2024
full_summary:
### Tenders for Aluminium Ground Flagpoles
#### Solicitation Number: WS4093716597
#### Reference Number: 4093716597-DOC4094054864
#### Description:
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC), on behalf of Parks Canada, is soliciting proposals from qualified contractors for the manufacture and delivery of aluminium ground flagpoles.

#### Tenders Due:
The tender closing date is [2023-09-08T14:00:00](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16838775?extsite=MTY4Mzg3NzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

#### Deliverables:
* Manufacture of 20-, 25-, 30-, and 35-foot aluminium ground flagpoles
* Delivery to Parks Canada sites located throughout Canada according to the addresses provided in Appendix 1
* Provision of installation instructions and technical support (answer questions) for base construction and mast assembly

#### Critical Requirements:
* The contractor must demonstrate the capacity to perform the required production and delivery for all addresses in each region.
* All deliverables must be completed by May 2024.

#### Evaluation Criteria:
The proposals will be evaluated using a combined rating system, which will consider both the technical merit and price of the proposals.

#### Trade Agreements:
This solicitation may be governed by the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

#### Contact Information:
Darya Kritova, 
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada
darya.kritova@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

You can find further details on the solicitation
